type: Reconstruction of a Wharf and Launchway
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for the reconstruction of a wharf and a launchway at Isle Aux Morts in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador and has invited suppliers to bid.
description: The work covers the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required for the wharf and launchway reconstruction. The estimated value of the contract is in the range of $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 and the delivery date is within 54 weeks after the award of the contract. The bid security is also a requirement for this tender.
full_summary:
================================soles

### Government Tender Announcement

[Title]
--------

**ITT DFO Wharf and Launchway Reconstruction – Isle Aux Morts, NL**

**Appel d’offres de reconstruction du quai et de la rampe de lancement du ministère des Pêches et des Océans (MPO) – Isle Aux Morts (T.-N.-L.)**

### Solicitation Details

| **Reference ID** | **WS4149847000-Doc4201827309** |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation ID** | **WS4149847000** |
| **Publication Date** | **September 8, 2023** |
| **Tender Closing Date** | **October 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (AST)** |
| **Amendment Date** | **October 12, 2023** |
| **Delivery Date** | **54 weeks from contract award** |

### Contract Details

* [Independent Government Cost Estimate] Estimate value: CAD $1,000,001 to CAD $5,000,000
* **Work Coverage**: Wharf and Launchway Reconstruction at Isle Aux Morts, Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Delivery Address**: Isle Aux Morts, Newfoundland and Labrador

### Contract Requirements

* Environmental pollution liability insurance coverage
* Bid security
* Scope of work: furnishing of plant, labor, equipment, and materials

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information**: Alexandria Dwyer, SPAC/PSPC, alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Details

* Invitation to Qualify: This solicitation is an Invitation to Qualify following an initial Invitation to Qualify. Suppliers who have been pre-qualified in accordance with the Invitation to Qualify can submit a bid.
* Competitive - Selective tendering: Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
* Lowers Price: The selection criteria for this solicitation will be based on a lowest price evaluation.
